Literature Review: Single-cell proteomics has revolutionized the field of biology and disease research by enabling the analysis of high-dimensional datasets comprising millions of cells. The advent of single-cell proteomics technologies has prompted the development of computational tools to process and visualize the complex data. In this review, we outline the steps of single-cell and spatial proteomics analysis pipelines, highlighting the advantages and pitfalls of the currently available computational toolkits.
